query.statement:
SELECT A.HST, A.UPN, A.PJT, A.CST, A.HNO, A.ARA, VALUE(D.CTEXT2,'') ARA_NM, A.BSU, VALUE(E.ABR_NM,'') BSU_NM, VALUE(C.KUNNR_NM,'') KNM, VALUE(C.ZSITE_NM,'') SPT, VALUE(F.CS101_IGD,'') IGD, VALUE(F.CS101_ISD,'') FDT, '' MGND_NM, '' BGT, '' BMT, CASE VALUE(B.CS126_GND,'') WHEN 'C' THEN '유상공사' WHEN 'D' THEN '유상일반' ELSE VALUE(B.CS126_GND,'') END UGND_NM, VALUE(B.CS126_AMT,0) AMT, VALUE(B.CS126_USD,'') USD, VALUE(B.CS126_UMR,'') UMR, A.FSD, A.JJD, '' RMK FROM SAPHEE.ZCST111 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PJT = B.CS126_PJT AND A.HNO = B.CS126_HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST101 F ON A.MANDT = F.MANDT AND A.PJT = F.CS101_PJT AND A.HNO = F.CS101_HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.PJT = C.POSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE D ON A.MANDT = D.MANDT AND A.ARA = D.CODE2 AND D.CODE1 = 'CS115' AND D.CODE2 <> 'E1' AND D.LANG = #G_LANG# LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBT010 E ON A.MANDT = E.MANDT AND A.BSU = E.LGORT AND E.BSU_ARA > '' AND E.LGORT > '' WHERE 1=1 AND A.MANDT = '183' AND A.ARA > '' AND A.BSU > '' AND A.HST <> 'D' AND A.HST <> 'F' AND A.HST IN ('S','B')
AND A.ARA = #ARA#
AND A.BSU = #BSU#
AND SUBSTR(A.HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND A.EXC = '' AND ((A.JJD > '' AND A.UDT = '') OR (A.JJD > '' AND A.UDT > '' AND A.JJD > A.UDT)) AND A.JJD BETWEEN #YYMM1# || '01' AND #YYMM1# || '31' AND VALUE(B.CS126_ARA,'') > '' AND VALUE(B.CS126_BSU,'') > '' AND VALUE(B.CS126_DDT,'') = '' AND VALUE(B.CS126_PST,'') = 'A6' AND HEX(DATE(SUBSTR(A.JJD,1,4) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.JJD,5,2) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.JJD,7,2)) - 1 DAYS) BETWEEN VALUE(B.CS126_USD,'') AND VALUE(B.CS126_UMR,'') ORDER BY A.ARA, A.BSU, A.UPN, A.CST, A.PJT, A.HNO WITH UR
